alert.note: Alert for Northern Worcester (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 6:52PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Worcester County through 730 PM EDT... At 651 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Barre, or 14 miles southeast of Orange, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Little to no impact from hail is expected. Locations impacted include... Holden, Spencer, Rutland, Barre, Paxton, North Brookfield, Hubbardston, Hardwick, Oakham, Phillipston, Petersham and New Braintree. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed. Do not drive through flooded roads or underpasses. Avoid low lying areas near small streams.
